title: How to include header and footer page for every page automatically - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are creating your website on HTML CSS then you need to put codes in every single page. however if you have PHP coding experience you can simple call it, i prefer WordPress all the time :) its a lot easiest with these things…. and helps me save a lot of my time.
Use the same template for every page and statically (or dynamically) have the header and footer embedded in the template.
